text: Approval for the stan s31 fetal heart monitor.  The device is indicated as an adjunct to fetal heart rate monitoring to determine whether obstetrical intervention is warranted when there is increased risk of developing metabolic acidosis.  The device is intended for use in patients with: 1) planned vaginal delivery; 2) >36 completed weeks gestation; 3) singleton fetus; 4) vertex presentation; and 5) ruptured amniotic membranes.
